People

People（Categorized by organizations）

Preparatory Meeting of the Unification of Chinese Language（Estalished in 1919）

Chairman：Yilin Zhang

Vice Chairman：Xitao Yuan、Jingheng Wu

Memeber：Jinxi Li、Maozhi Chen、Yi Shen、Buqing Li、Ji Lu、Wenxiong zhu、Daosun Qian、Xuantong Qian、Shi Hu、Fu Liu、Zuoren Zhou、Yuzhao Ma、Yuen Ren Chao、Yi Wang、Yuanpei Cai、Zhenying Bai、Jialin Xiao、Lijin Zeng、Shiqing Sun、Yi Fang、Jianshi Shen、Jinhui Li、Dishan Xuu、Yuutang Lin、Pu Wang，et al 172 in total.

Renamed to “Preparatory Committee of the Unification of Chinese Language” by the Republic of China government

Chairman：Jingheng Wu

Standing Committee Member：Xuantong Qian、Jinxi Li、Maozhi Chen、Yi Wang、Yi Sheng、Zhenying Bai、Jiangong Wei

Member：Yuanpei Cai、Yilin Zhang、Shizeng Li、Shuhua Li、Buqing Li、Shi Hu、Fu Liu、Zuoren Zhou、Ji Lu、Wenxiong Zhu、Lijin Zeng、[Shiqing Sun]](/people/sunshiqing.html)、Yi Fang、Jianshi Shen、Dishan Xuu、Yuutang Lin、Hongjun Ren、Tigan Ma、Daosun Qian、Yuzao Ma、Jialin Xiao et al, 31 in total.
